title: (x) "L&D" very bold soft serif face - Goudy Heavyface {Loremipsum}
content:
Looking for an id on the “L & D” written on this shirt. Do they all belong to the same family? Thanks in advance for any help,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706223436im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/lemar-dauley-07-holiday-2_4439.jpg)
